lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<sim> \<tau>.(Q)"

lemma inputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   x :: name

  assumes PSimQ: "\<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<sim> Q[x::=y]"
  
  shows "a<x>.P \<sim> a<x>.Q"

lemma outputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "a{b}.P \<sim> a{b}.Q"

lemma matchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "[a\<frown>b]P \<sim> [a\<frown>b]Q"

lemma mismatchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "[a\<noteq>b]P \<sim> [a\<noteq>b]Q"

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<sim> Q \<oplus> R"

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name
  
  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<sim> <\<nu>x>Q"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  and   T :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<sim> Q \<parallel> R"

lemma bangRelBisimE: 
  fixes P   :: pi
  and   Q   :: pi
  and   Rel :: "(pi \<times> pi) set"

  assumes A:   "(P, Q) \<in> bangRel Rel"
  and     Sym: "\<And>P Q. (P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (Q, P) \<in> Rel"

  shows "(Q, P) \<in> bangRel Rel"

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes PBiSimQ: "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "!P \<sim> !Q"

lemma bangRelBisimE: 
  fixes P   :: pi
  and   Q   :: pi
  and   Rel :: "(pi \<times> pi) set"

  assumes A:   "(P, Q) \<in> bangRel Rel"
  and     Sym: "\<And>P Q. (P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (Q, P) \<in> Rel"

  shows "(Q, P) \<in> bangRel Rel"

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q. (P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (!Q, !P) \<in> bangRel Rel

       \<lbrakk>(R, T) \<in> Rel; (P, Q) \<in> bangRel Rel;
        (Q, P) \<in> bangRel Rel\<rbrakk>
